p: The PC-12 cells were seeded onto a 6-well plate at a density of 5 × 10 5 cells per well and incubated for 24 h at 37 ± 2 °C in a 5% CO 2-humidified incubator. The cells were then incubated with HESAE or desipramine for 48 h followed by 400 μM corticosterone for 24 h. Cells were scrapped and collected by centrifugation at 2000 x g for 10 min at 4 °C. The pellet was homogenised in HEPES buffer and centrifuged at 10,000 x g for 15 min at 4 °C to obtain the supernatant. The CAT activity was determined using a CAT assay kit (Cayman Chemical, Michigan, USA) according to the manufacturer’s protocol. Absorbance was measured at 540 nm using a multimode microplate reader (SpectraMax M3; Molecular Devices, San Jose, CA, USA). The activity was expressed as a percentage of the negative control level.
